meanings.sent1: I saw many ads on TV during the show.
meanings.sent2: The ads in the magazine caught my attention.
meanings.sent3: The ads on the bus made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with ads, like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The ads on the billboard were impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: The plural form of ad, meaning an advertisement.
meanings.sent1: The company published new ads in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: Ads are everywhere, from websites to radio stations.
meanings.sent3: The ads on the radio were so catchy.
meanings.sent4: She collected ads like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The ads on the website were annoyingly persistent.

meanings.definition: The plural form of ad, meaning an advertisement.
meanings.sent1: I need to create more ads for our campaign.
meanings.sent2: Ads play a crucial role in marketing products.
meanings.sent3: The ads on the subway were surprisingly creative.
meanings.sent4: His mind was filled with ads, like a bustling marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The ads on social media were overwhelming.
